DOC.brief_summary: Appendectomy common surgical procedure perform emergency surgery . Because lack consensus appropriate technique , appendectomy still perform open ( OA ) laparoscopic ( LA ) method . In retrospective analysis , investigator aim compare laparoscopic approach conventional technique treatment acute appendicitis .
DOC.criteria: acute appendicitis Pregnant woman patient severe medical disease ( hemodynamic instability , chronic medical psychiatric illness , cirrhosis , coagulation disorder ) require intensive care
